trans-unit.source: Python library to access and use image scanners (Linux/Windows/etc)
trans-unit.target: イメージスキャナにアクセスして利用するための Python ライブラリ (Linux/Windows/etc)

trans-unit.source: Python library to access and use image scanners (devices). Works on GNU/Linux (Sane), *BSD (Sane), Windows >= Vista (WIA 2), MacOSX (Sane), etc.
trans-unit.target: Python library to access and use image scanners (devices). Works on GNU/Linux (Sane), *BSD (Sane), Windows >= Vista (WIA 2), MacOSX (Sane), etc.
